name: No country for young men
description:
This is definetly no country for young men!

The main objetive of the game is growing your kingdom. You are a feudal lady and you have childs, lots of them, and you can have even more! Try to send them to marry other princesses of the countries, and expand your empire!

Arranged marriages are problematic and there are some bloody princesses out there.

Sorry about the bugs, we didnt have enought time for test and balance the game. I hope at least you enjoy the idea an the music! ;)

Team:

@enzo_ferey - Programmer

@leftdoors - Pixel Artist

@celer_gut - Music

@Haokarlos - Game designer & Programmer

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
